title: Seymour: the relevance of sociology
brief_description: SUMMARY: Based on the Open University film Seymour. Short segments from the film are shown and Ronald Fletcher looks at the behaviour of the characters in the light of sociological theories. Points out that sociology brings new perspective to the understa
